title: Barron Trump called UK police after seeing woman 'beat up', court hears
description: President Trump's youngest son told officers in London he had seen a friend being attacked during a video call.
content:
Donald Trump's youngest son contacted UK police saying he witnessed a friend in London being "beat up" during a video call, a court has heard.
Barron Trump, 19, told police he had friends call 999 from the US so that he could report the alleged attac... [1910 chars]

title: Number of police forces in England and Wales to be cut in major shake-up
description: Home Secretary Shabana Mahmood will announce plans for police reform next week.
content:
The government is to radically reduce the number of police forces in England and Wales as part of what sources have called the largest reform of policing in decades.
Home Secretary Shabana Mahmood will announce plans for police reform next week.
She ... [2079 chars]

title: Trump sues JPMorgan Chase and Jamie Dimon for at least $5bn
description: US president alleges JPMorgan stopped offering him banking services in wake of January 6 Capitol riot
content:
Donald Trump has sued JPMorgan Chase and its CEO, Jamie Dimon, for at least $5bn after accusing America’s largest bank of “debanking” him.
The US president alleged that JPMorgan stopped offering him banking services in the wake of the Capitol riot on... [2811 chars]

title: Plymouth acid attack victim killed in plot involving ex-wife, court hears
description: Seven men and three women are on trial at Winchester Crown Court after the fatal attack last year.
content:
A drug dealer who owed £120k to his "boss" and childhood friend was doused in acid at his home in a fatal attack involving his ex-wife, a court has heard.
Danny Cahalane, 38, was attacked on Lipson Road, Plymouth, on 21 February 2025 and died in hosp... [1899 chars]

title: Our Town review - Michael Sheen brings warmth and wit to Welsh National Theatre opener
description: Thornton Wilder’s classic American play is transposed for this company’s inaugural production. The result is heartfelt, though its emotional bite can seem uncertain
content: A revival of Thornton Wilder’s great American play about a provincial town, north of New York, might have carried strong state-of-the-nation resonances at this dark, Trumpian juncture. So it initially seems counterintuitive that this inaugural show f... [3973 chars]
